1.0.1:
Initialized some test commands.
Cleaned up directories and file structure.
1.0.2: Looks is normally distributed with stdev = 5/3 and mean = 5.
IQ is normally distributed with stdev = 100/3 and mean = 100.
MMR is normally distributed with stdev = 5000/3 and mean = 5000.
Salary is log-normally distributed with stdev = 2 and mean = 5, value multiplied by 10000.
1.0.3: Modified !stats salary to stdev = 1 and mean = 1, value multiplied by 50000.
1.0.4: Modified commands/index.js to search directory for relevant command files automatically.
1.0.5: Changed !stats format to use less space. Adjusted formatting.
1.0.6: Changed !stats format to use table format.
1.0.7: Reworked and made the !stats command more pretty.
1.0.8: Added !count command. Count up by one, 10% chance of counting by 5. Total is saved.
